channel.title: [PI] Npc Error Help
channel.description:
I need help, i used a different code and replaced my npc.java, ok it was to make corp and td's drop items, they drop items now but i get this error also.
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.utilscanner.nextline(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.loaddrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(init)(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.(clinit)(Server.java:71)

item.title: [PI] Npc Error Help
item.dc:creator: @stooks stooks
item.description:
@stooks wrote:

[quote=“F A I L S, post:3, topic:414089”][quote author=stooks link=topic=516053.msg3744438#msg3744438 date=1315629794]
I tried to change my NPC drops one time…didn’t work out well :)…haha
[/quote]That was sorta useless? :)[/quote]
Very true… scratch what I said

Read full topic
